subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ loss to the Redskins squandered a chance to clinch a wild-card playoff berth. The injury to Jeremy Shockey, who fractured his left fibula, only deepens their disappointment.
snippet: The Giants’ loss to the Redskins squandered a chance to clinch a wild-card playoff berth. The injury to Jeremy Shockey, who fractured his left fibula, only deepens their disappointment.
